definition: dish (type of food)/vegetable/cuisine/CL:盤|盘[pan2],道[dao4]/(coll.) (one's) type/(of one's skills etc) weak/poor
to connect/to relate to/to tie up/to bind/to be (literary)

sentences.english: Well, there are eight different Chinese cuisines.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，中国菜包括八大菜系。

sentences.english: Anhui cuisine is one of the eight great traditions of Chinese cuisine.
sentences.chinese: 徽菜是中国传统的八大菜系之一。

sentences.english: There are mainly eight famous Chinese cuisines .
Thailand, like Italy, is a country of many regional cuisines.
sentences.chinese: 和意大利一样，泰国有很多地方菜系。

sentences.english: Winter bamboo shoots can be found in four major Chinese cuisines.
sentences.chinese: 在中国的四大菜系里，都能见到冬笋。

sentences.english: Chinese cooking is subdivided into a great man schools notable for their local flavors.
sentences.chinese: 中国烹饪被分为许多大的菜系，以地方风味著名。

sentences.english: There are eight cuisines in C…10 free trials used up.
sentences.chinese: 在中国有八大菜系，其中川菜是最有名的。

sentences.english: Huaiyang is one of China's four major cuisines.
sentences.chinese: 淮杨菜可是中国四大菜系之一。

sentences.english: They have a lot of different like, Shanghainese cuisine and some southern cuisines.
sentences.chinese: 有多种菜系，像上海菜和一些南方菜。

sentences.english: Shandong cuisine is an important part of China's cuisine system.
sentences.chinese: 鲁菜是中国烹饪领域中的重要菜系。

sentences.english: Some people say there are altogether eight major culinary schools in China. These dishes are Shanghai style.
sentences.chinese: 有人说中国有八大菜系，这些菜是上海菜。

sentences.english: The restaurant features a special dishes of Menlu roasted duck, as well as Shandong, Hunan, and Guangdong dishes.
sentences.chinese: 店内以焖炉烤鸭为特色菜，并以鲁湘粤菜系为辅。

sentences.english: Sichuanese cooking is classified as one of the eight great cuisines of China.
sentences.chinese: 川菜被归为中国八大菜系之一。

sentences.english: What kind of cuisine do you have in your dining-room？
sentences.chinese: 你们的餐厅有什么菜系？

sentences.english: With a rich variety of strong flavors, Sichuan cuisine is best known for being spicy-hot.
sentences.chinese: 四川菜系口味重，以麻辣著称。

sentences.english: Huai-Yang cuisine is an important cuisine style in China.
sentences.chinese: 淮扬菜系是我国烹饪行业的一支重要流派。

definition: dish (food prepared according to a specific recipe)
signature dish/a restaurant’s most famous dish
